issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
h3. So far every time I start Appcelerator Studio after installing 4.5.0, the attached dialog appears with the following message:

An internal error occurred during: 'Retrieving version for Appcelerator Studio'. java.lang.NullPointerException
fields.summary: After upgrading to studio 4.5.0 receiving error on startup
fields.environment:
Platform: OSX El Capitan, 10.11.3 (15D21)
Studio Version: 4.5.0.201602070910
Studio Build: jenkins-appcelerator-rcp-development-844 (origin/development)

comments.body: Hello, The error usually occur when you have a problem during updating the studio. I would recommend try to uninstall the studio and reinstall manually. Download the studio from [here|https://web.appcelerator.com/product/studio]. The latest version is 4.4.0. Thanks.
